# Authorizations Flow {.unnumbered}

## User Perspective {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart
  A[Register] --> B[Confirm account in email] --> C[Request Authorization]
  C --> D[Existing Institution]
  C --> E[New Institution]
  C --> G[Request Authorized Investigator]
  A --> F[No Request]
  B --> F[No Request]
```

## Admin Perspective {-}

```{mermaid}
flowchart
  A[Request Type] --> B[Existing Institution] --> G{View Person Profile Page - Eligible? } --> H(Yes, email next steps)
  G --> I(No, Send 'To Process Request' Email)
  A --> C[No Request] --> F(Send 'To Initiate Authorization' Email)
  A --> D[New Institution]
  A --> E[Authorized Investigator]
```
